messages.content: The answer is simple; I want to help make the Cotswolds a better place to live and work for everyone.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Supporting the need for more affordable homes & I want people to have the chance to stay local.
They need jobs and good employment opportunities with meaningful prospects.
I care deeply about the growing number of local businesses and homes in Cotswolds directly affected by Brexit. As your next MP, I will ensure that our communityâ€™s views are heard in parliament.

issues.brexitEurope: I care deeply about the growing number of local businesses and homes in Cotswolds directly affected by Brexit.

housing.content: Supporting the need for more affordable homes & I want people to have the chance to stay local.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am determined and have a history of getting things done

images.caption: Liberal Democrat Parliamentary Candidate for The Cotswolds
